current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the National Telecommunications and Information Administration to update a report on the
			 role of telecommunications, including the Internet, in the commission of
			 hate crimes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
